data: It was a howling gale outside, but howling gales were common things to Peter, and he did not see why this one need hinder his taking a little stroll along the docks.
Connolly, James B. (James Brendan), 1868-1957; Aylward, W. J. (William James), 1875-1956 [Illustrator]; Reuterdahl, Henry, 1871-1925 [Illustrator]
